text: gwabu yeoseong-gwa yaghon-eul hageonama-eum-e tteus-eul duneun geos-eun joega anigeoneul ineun hananimkkeseo neohuideul-i ma-eum-e saegigo iss-eum-eul algo gyesim ila geuleona gidalineun beobjeong-gigan dong-an-e bimil-i yaghon-eul haeseoneun an doemyeo geu beobjeong-gigan-i kkeutnal ttaekkaji gyeolhon-eul haeseodo ani doenila hana nim-eun neohuideul-ui ma-eum-eul algo gyesi nani hananim-eul gong-gyeonghala hananim-eungwan-yong-gwa eunhyelo chungmanhasim-ila
